title: Xscape Women's Long Off The Shoulder Scuba Crepe Dress (Reg and Petite)
description: Model is wearing a size 4 dress. Size 4 measures approximately 60" from shoulder to hem.
Fits true to size for a perfect, comfortable fit.
Features built-in bra cups for added support and convenience.
This dress is fitted at the waist and hips. The fabric has some stretch.
The ruffle neckline adds a playful yet polished flair to this elegant off-the-shoulder gown.

Step into elegance with a long off-the-shoulder crepe dress, featuring 3/4 sleeves, a delicate ruffle, and a hidden back zipper for a flawless fit. Fully lined for comfort, it’s perfect for any special occasion.
